```{r}
data1_counts

data2_counts <- data2 %>%
  select(mrace6) %>%
  count(mrace6) %>%
  rename(denom_counts = n) %>%
  group_by(mrace6)

data2_counts

data <- cbind.data.frame(data1_counts, data2_counts$denom_counts) %>%
  mutate(proportion = (num_counts/data2_counts$denom_counts)*1000)

data
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(fill=mrace6, y=proportion, x=mrace6)) + 
    geom_bar(stat = "identity")+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust=1)) +
  labs(title="Race Distribution for Trans People (Weighted & Unweighted)")
```
